title: Can people smell salt or sugar? - Quora

response.answer_text: I could smell sugar when I was younger and if it was a wet salt (I gather fresh salt from the headlands and sometimes it is still suspended crystals in the seawater). Sugar smells similar to what it tastes like, warm, sweet with a very slight herbal note. The wet salt smells like sea water or the ocean beach but that is just what it is.
Yes, sugar smells sweet, and well,salt is salty
